name: 1strwun
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c1)
⊣ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ WUni)
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` ndx)∈ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c1)
⊣ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ WUni)
⊣ (w0 →(Base ` ndx)∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cnx, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(Base ` ndx)∈ c1)
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ WUni)
⊣ (w0 → ndx ∈ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cnx, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c1)
⊣ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 > }
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ WUni)
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ (w0 → ndx ∈ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cnx, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cnx, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(com, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(com, c1))

comment: A constructed one-slot structure in a weak universe. (Contributed by AV, 27-Mar-2020.)
